trans-unit.source: This module will sort resulting pg_hba files if a rule change is required. This could give unexpected results with manual created hba files, if it was improperly sorted. For example a rule was created for a net first and for a ip in that net range next. In that situation, the ‘ip specific rule’ will never hit, it is in the pg_hba file obsolete. After the pg_hba file is rewritten by the community.general.postgresql_pg_hba module, the ip specific rule will be sorted above the range rule. And then it will hit, which will give unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更改规则，此模块将对生成的 pg_hba 文件进行排序。如果手动创建的hba文件排序不正确，可能会产生意想不到的结果。例如，首先为网络创建一个规则，然后为该网络范围内的IP创建一个规则。在这种情况下，“ ip特定规则”将永远不会 pg_hba ，它在pg_hba文件中已过时。在由community.general.postgresql_pg_hba模块重写 pg_hba 文件之后，特定于ip的规则将排在范围规则之上。然后它将击中，这将产生意外的结果。

trans-unit.source: This module will sort resulting pg_hba files if a rule change is required. This could give unexpected results with manual created hba files, if it was improperly sorted. For example a rule was created for a net first and for a ip in that net range next. In that situation, the ‘ip specific rule’ will never hit, it is in the pg_hba file obsolete. After the pg_hba file is rewritten by the community.postgresql.postgresql_pg_hba module, the ip specific rule will be sorted above the range rule. And then it will hit, which will give unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更改规则，此模块将对生成的 pg_hba 文件进行排序。如果排序不正确，使用手动创建的hba文件可能会产生意想不到的结果。例如，首先为网络创建一个规则，然后为该网络范围内的IP创建一个规则。在这种情况下，“ ip特定规则”将永远不会 pg_hba ，它在pg_hba文件中已过时。在由community.postgresql.postgresql_pg_hba模块重写 pg_hba 文件之后，特定于ip的规则将排在范围规则之上。然后它将击中，这将产生意外的结果。

trans-unit.source: This module will sort resulting pg_hba files if a rule change is required. This could give unexpected results with manual created hba files, if it was improperly sorted. For example a rule was created for a net first and for a ip in that net range next. In that situation, the ‘ip specific rule’ will never hit, it is in the pg_hba file obsolete. After the pg_hba file is rewritten by the postgresql_pg_hba module, the ip specific rule will be sorted above the range rule. And then it will hit, which will give unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更改规则，此模块将对生成的 pg_hba 文件进行排序。如果排序不正确，使用手动创建的hba文件可能会产生意想不到的结果。例如，首先为网络创建一个规则，然后为该网络范围内的IP创建一个规则。在这种情况下，“ ip特定规则”将永远不会 pg_hba ，它已在pg_hba文件中过时了。在由postgresql_pg_hba模块重写 pg_hba 文件后，特定于ip的规则将在range规则之上排序。然后它将击中，这将产生意外的结果。

trans-unit.source: This only applies to new partitions.

trans-unit.source: This only removes the role from Galaxy. It does not remove or alter the actual GitHub repository.

trans-unit.source: This only works for specific versions of the PsExec binary.

trans-unit.target: 这个onyx插件提供了低级抽象apis,用于发送和接收Mellanox ONYX网络设备的CLI命令。

trans-unit.source: This operation is all or none, meaning it will stop if there are some pool members that cannot be removed.
trans-unit.target: 此操作为全或无,即如果有一些不能删除的池成员,它将停止。

trans-unit.source: This operation is all or none, meaning it will stop if there are some pools that cannot be removed.
trans-unit.target: 此操作为全或无,也就是说,如果有一些池子无法删除,它将停止。

trans-unit.source: This operation is all or none, meaning that it will stop if there are some pool members that cannot be removed.
trans-unit.target: 这个操作是全或无,也就是说,如果有一些不能删除的池成员,它将停止。

trans-unit.source: This operation is all or none, meaning that it will stop if there are some pools that cannot be removed.
trans-unit.target: 这个操作是全或无,也就是说,如果有一些池子不能删除,它就会停止。

trans-unit.source: This operation is performed after any changes are made to the current running config. If no changes are made, the configuration is still saved to the startup config.
trans-unit.target: 此操作在对当前运行的配置进行任何更改后执行。如果不做任何更改,配置仍会保存到启动配置中。

trans-unit.source: This operation will only update firmware on shelves/disk that do not have the latest firmware-revision.
trans-unit.target: 此操作只会更新没有最新固件版本的货架/磁盘上的固件。

trans-unit.source: This operational mode is useful to reduce the number of health monitor probes in case of a hybrid scenario.
trans-unit.target: 这种操作模式有助于在混合情况下减少健康监测器探头的数量。

trans-unit.source: This option *is not* the equivalent of passing the -f flag to apt-get on the command line
trans-unit.target: 该选项***不等同于在命令行上将 -f 标志传递给apt-get

trans-unit.source: This option allow the user explicit define the format of LUKS container that wants to work with. Options are luks1 or luks2
trans-unit.target: 此选项允许用户显式定义要使用的LUKS容器的格式。选项是 luks1 或 luks2

trans-unit.source: This option allow the user to create a LUKS2 format container with label support, respectively to identify the container by label on later usages.
trans-unit.target: 该选项允许用户创建一个支持标签的LUKS2格式容器,分别在以后的使用中通过标签来识别该容器。

trans-unit.source: This option allows Ansible to fall back to unsafe methods of updating files when atomic operations fail (however, it doesn't force Ansible to perform unsafe writes).
trans-unit.target: 这个选项允许Ansible在原子操作失败时回落到不安全的更新文件的方法(但是,它不会强制Ansible执行不安全的写入)。

trans-unit.source: This option allows client-side filtering hosts with jinja templating.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项允许客户端过滤主机与jinja模板。

trans-unit.source: This option allows configuring hashed passwords on Cisco IOS devices.
trans-unit.target: 该选项允许在Cisco IOS设备上配置哈希密码。

trans-unit.source: This option allows property name sanitization to create safe property names for use in Ansible.
trans-unit.target: 该选项允许对属性名进行消毒,以创建安全的属性名供Ansible使用。

trans-unit.source: This option allows the become method to be specified in for handling privilege escalation. Typically the become_method value is set to enable but could be defined as other values.
trans-unit.target: 此选项允许在指定方法中成为处理特权升级的方法。通常，begin_method值设置为 enable 但可以定义为其他值。

trans-unit.source: This option allows the user to define the cipher specification string for the LUKS container.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项允许用户为LUKS容器定义密码规范字符串。

trans-unit.source: This option allows the user to specify the hash function used in LUKS key setup scheme and volume key digest.
trans-unit.target: 该选项允许用户指定LUKS密钥设置方案和卷密钥摘要中使用的哈希函数。

trans-unit.source: This option allows to change the group ID to a non-unique value. Requires gid.
trans-unit.target: 此选项允许将组ID更改为非唯一值。需要 gid 。

trans-unit.source: This option allows to provide a list of errors that are not failing the module.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项允许提供一个没有失败的模块的错误列表。

trans-unit.source: This option allows you to globally configure a custom path for ‘local_facts’ for the implied M(ansible.builtin.setup) task when using fact gathering. If not set, it will fallback to the default from the M(ansible.builtin.setup) module: /etc/ansible/facts.d. This does not affect user defined tasks that use the M(ansible.builtin.setup) module.
trans-unit.target: 使用事实收集时，此选项使您可以为隐式M（ansible.builtin.setup）任务全局配置“ local_facts”的自定义路径。如果未设置，它将从M（ansible.builtin.setup）模块回退到默认值： /etc/ansible/facts.d 。这并不会影响使用M（ansible.builtin.setup）模块用户定义的任务。

trans-unit.source: This option allows you to globally configure a custom path for ‘local_facts’ for the implied M(ansible.builtin.setup) task when using fact gathering.If not set, it will fallback to the default from the M(ansible.builtin.setup) module: /etc/ansible/facts.d.This does not affect user defined tasks that use the M(ansible.builtin.setup) module.
trans-unit.target: 此选项允许您在使用事实收集时为隐式M（ansible.builtin.setup）任务全局配置'local_facts'的自定义路径，如果未设置，它将从M（ansible.builtin.setup）退回到默认）模块： /etc/ansible/facts.d 。这并不会影响使用该M（ansible.builtin.setup）模块用户定义的任务。

trans-unit.source: This option allows you to globally configure a custom path for ‘local_facts’ for the implied M(setup) task when using fact gathering. If not set, it will fallback to the default from the M(setup) module: /etc/ansible/facts.d. This does not affect user defined tasks that use the M(setup) module.
trans-unit.target: 此选项使您可以在使用事实收集时为隐式M（setup）任务全局配置“ local_facts”的自定义路径。如果未设置，它将从M（setup）模块 /etc/ansible/facts.d 默认值：/etc/ansible/facts.d。这并不会影响使用的M（安装）模块的用户定义的任务。

trans-unit.source: This option allows you to globally configure a custom path for ‘local_facts’ for the implied M(setup) task when using fact gathering.If not set, it will fallback to the default from the M(setup) module: /etc/ansible/facts.d.This does not affect user defined tasks that use the M(setup) module.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项允许你为隐含M（设置）任务“local_facts”使用其实gathering.If没有设置时全局配置自定义路径，将回退到从M（设置）模块默认： /etc/ansible/facts.d 。这并不会影响使用该M（设置）模块用户定义的任务。

trans-unit.source: This option can also be omitted to default to an accepted value.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项也可以省略,默认为一个可接受的值。

trans-unit.target: 这个选项可以是包含驱动器固件的文件路径和/或目录的列表。

trans-unit.target: 此选项不能与delete_public_access一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This option controls how the module queries the package managers on the system. first means it will return only information for the first supported package manager available. all will return information for all supported and available package managers on the system.
trans-unit.target: 此选项控制模块如何查询系统上的程序包管理器。 first 意味着它将仅返回有关第一个受支持的程序包管理器的信息。 all 将返回系统上所有受支持的可用软件包管理器的信息。

trans-unit.source: This option controls if notified handlers run on a host even if a failure occurs on that host. When false, the handlers will not run if a failure has occurred on a host. This can also be set per play or on the command line. See Handlers and Failure for more details.
trans-unit.target: 该选项控制即使主机发生故障,通知的处理程序是否在该主机上运行。当为false时,如果主机上发生了故障,处理程序将不会运行。这个选项也可以在每个游戏或命令行上设置。更多细节请参见处理程序和失败。

trans-unit.source: This option controls if notified handlers run on a host even if a failure occurs on that host.When false, the handlers will not run if a failure has occurred on a host.This can also be set per play or on the command line. See Handlers and Failure for more details.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项控制是否在主机上运行通知处理程序,即使失败发生在该主机上。当为false时,如果失败发生在主机上,处理程序将不会运行。更多细节请参见处理程序和失败。

trans-unit.source: This option controls the autodecryption of source files using vault.
trans-unit.target: 该选项控制使用vault对源文件进行自动解密。

trans-unit.source: This option controls the netconf server action after an error occurs while editing the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项可以控制编辑配置时发生错误后netconf服务器的动作。

trans-unit.source: This option defines the minimum password length.
trans-unit.target: 该选项定义了最小密码长度。

trans-unit.source: This option defines whether the task debugger will be invoked on a failed task when ignore_errors=True is specified. True specifies that the debugger will honor ignore_errors, False will not honor ignore_errors.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项定义了当指定ignore_errors=True时,是否会在失败的任务上调用任务调试器。True表示调试器将尊重ignore_errors,False不尊重ignore_errors。

trans-unit.source: This option defines whether the task debugger will be invoked on a failed task when ignore_errors=True is specified.True specifies that the debugger will honor ignore_errors, False will not honor ignore_errors.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项定义了当指定ignore_errors=True时,是否会在失败的任务上调用任务调试器,True指定调试器会尊重ignore_errors,False则不会尊重ignore_errors。

trans-unit.source: This option dictates whether the role's vars and defaults are exposed to the playbook. If set to yes the variables will be available to tasks following the include_role task. This functionality differs from standard variable exposure for roles listed under the roles header or import_role as they are exposed at playbook parsing time, and available to earlier roles and tasks as well.
trans-unit.target: 此选项决定角色的 vars 和 defaults 是否公开给剧本。如果设置为 yes ,则变量将可用于 include_role 任务之后的任务。此功能不同于 roles 标头或 import_role 下列出的角色的标准变量公开，因为它们在剧本解析时公开，并且也可用于较早的角色和任务。

trans-unit.source: This option does not disable the user, only lock the password.
trans-unit.target: 此选项不会禁用用户,只会锁定密码。

trans-unit.source: This option does not disable the user, only lock the password. Do not change the password in the same task.
trans-unit.target: 此选项不会禁用用户,只会锁定密码。不要在同一任务中更改密码。

trans-unit.source: This option does nothing and will be removed in community.general 3.0.0.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项没有任何作用,将在community.general 3.0.0中被删除。

trans-unit.source: This option doesn't have any effect and is deprecated, it will be removed in 3.0.0.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项没有任何效果,已经废弃,将在3.0.0中删除。

trans-unit.source: This option enables or disables the logging of IP error packets.
trans-unit.target: 此选项可启用或禁用IP错误数据包的记录。

trans-unit.source: This option enables or disables the logging of TCP error packets.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项可以启用或禁用TCP错误数据包的记录。

trans-unit.source: This option enables or disables the logging of TCP events on the client side.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项可以在客户端启用或禁用TCP事件的日志记录。

trans-unit.source: This option enables or disables the logging of packets that match ACL rules configured with a drop action.
trans-unit.target: 此选项可启用或禁用与配置了丢弃操作的 ACL 规则相匹配的数据包的日志记录。

trans-unit.source: This option enables or disables the logging of packets that match ACL rules configured with a reject action.
trans-unit.target: 此选项可启用或禁用与配置了拒绝操作的ACL规则相匹配的数据包的日志记录。

trans-unit.source: This option enables or disables the logging of packets that match ACL rules configured with an "accept" or "accept decisively" action.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项可以启用或禁用与配置了 "接受 "或 "果断接受 "操作的ACL规则相匹配的数据包的日志记录。

trans-unit.source: This option enables or disables the logging of translated (i.e server side) fields in ACL match and TCP events.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项可以启用或禁用ACL匹配和TCP事件中的翻译(即服务器端)字段的记录。

trans-unit.source: This option forces color mode even when running without a TTY or the “nocolor” setting is True.
trans-unit.target: 即使在没有TTY或“ nocolor”设置为True的情况下运行，此选项也会强制使用颜色模式。

trans-unit.source: This option forces the sending of the Basic authentication header upon the original request.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项强制在原始请求中发送Basic认证头。

trans-unit.source: This option let's the user set the canned permissions on the object/bucket that are created. The permissions that can be set are 'private', 'public-read', 'authenticated-read'.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项可以让用户在创建的对象/bucket上设置预设的权限,可以设置的权限有'private'、'public-read'、'authenticated-read'。可以设置的权限是 "private"、"public-read"、"authenticated-read"。

trans-unit.source: This option lets the user set the canned permissions on the object/bucket that are created. The permissions that can be set are 'private', 'public-read', 'public-read-write', 'authenticated-read' for a bucket or 'private', 'public-read', 'public-read-write', 'aws-exec-read', 'authenticated-read', 'bucket-owner-read', 'bucket-owner-full-control' for an object. Multiple permissions can be specified as a list.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项可以让用户在创建的对象/bucket上设置罐装的权限。可以设置的权限有:对一个bucket的 "private"、"public-read"、"public-read-write"、"authenticated-read "或者对一个对象的 "private"、"public-read"、"public-read-write"、"aws-exec-read"、"authenticated-read"、"bucket-owner-read"、"bucket-owner-full-control"。可以将多个权限指定为一个列表。

trans-unit.source: This option lets the user set the canned permissions on the object/bucket that are created. Multiple permissions can be specified as a list.
trans-unit.target: 该选项使用户可以对创建的对象/存储桶设置固定权限。可以设置的权限是存储桶的 private ， public-read ， public-read-write ， authenticated-read 或 private ， public-read ， public-read-write ， aws-exec-read ， authenticated-read ， bucket-owner-read ，对象的 bucket-owner-full-control 。可以将多个权限指定为列表。

trans-unit.source: This option provides the path ending with directory name in which the backup configuration file will be stored. If the directory does not exist it will be created and the filename is either the value of filename or default filename as described in filename options description. If the path value is not given in that case a backup directory will be created in the current working directory and backup configuration will be copied in filename within backup directory.
trans-unit.target: 此选项提供以目录名称结尾的路径，将在其中存储备份配置文件。如果该目录不存在，将被创建并文件名是任意的值 filename 中所描述或默认的文件名 filename 的选择的说明。如果在这种情况下未提供路径值，则会在当前工作目录中创建一个备份目录，并且备份配置将复制到备份目录中的 filename 中。

trans-unit.source: This option provides the path ending with directory name in which the backup configuration file will be stored. If the directory does not exist it will be first created and the filename is either the value of filename or default filename as described in filename options description. If the path value is not given in that case a backup directory will be created in the current working directory and backup configuration will be copied in filename within backup directory.
trans-unit.target: 此选项提供以目录名称结尾的路径，将在其中存储备份配置文件。如果该目录不存在，将首先被创建，并且文件名是任意的值 filename 中所描述或默认的文件名 filename 的选择的说明。如果在这种情况下未提供路径值，则会在当前工作目录中创建一个备份目录，并且备份配置将复制到备份目录中的 filename 中。

trans-unit.source: This option provides the path ending with directory name in which the backup configuration file will be stored. If the directory does not exist, it will be first created and the filename is either the value of filename or default filename as described in filename options description. If the path value is not given, a backup directory will be created in the current working directory and backup configuration will be copied in filename within the backup directory.
trans-unit.target: 此选项提供以目录名称结尾的路径，在该目录中将存储备份配置文件。如果该目录不存在，它将被首先创建，并且文件名是任意的值 filename 中所描述或默认的文件名 filename 的选择的说明。如果未提供路径值，则将在当前工作目录中创建一个备份目录，并将备份配置复制到备份目录中的 filename 中。

trans-unit.source: This option provides the regex pattern and optional flags to match the error string from the received response chunk. This option accepts pattern and flags keys. The value of pattern is a python regex pattern to match the response and the value of flags is the value accepted by flags argument of re.compile python method to control the way regex is matched with the response, for example 're.I'.
trans-unit.target: 此选项提供正则表达式模式和可选标志，以匹配来自接收到的响应块的错误字符串。此选项接受 pattern 和 flags 键。 pattern 的值是匹配响应的python regex模式， flags 的值是re.compile python方法的flags参数接受的值，用于控制regex与响应的匹配方式，例如're.I'。

trans-unit.source: This page describes how to install Ansible on different platforms. Ansible is an agentless automation tool that by default manages machines over the SSH protocol. Once installed, Ansible does not add a database, and there will be no daemons to start or keep running. You only need to install it on one machine (which could easily be a laptop) and it can manage an entire fleet of remote machines from that central point. When Ansible manages remote machines, it does not leave software installed or running on them, so there’s no real question about how to upgrade Ansible when moving to a new version.
trans-unit.target: This page describes how to install Ansible on different platforms. Ansible is an agentless automation tool that by default manages machines over the SSH protocol. Once installed, Ansible does not add a database, and there will be no daemons to start or keep running. You only need to install it on one machine (which could easily be a laptop) and it can manage an entire fleet of remote machines from that central point. When Ansible manages remote machines, it does not leave software installed or running on them, so there’s no real question about how to upgrade Ansible when moving to a new version.

trans-unit.source: This playbook is useful. However, running it still requires several command-line flags. Also, running a playbook against a single device is not a huge efficiency gain over making the same change manually. The next step to harnessing the full power of Ansible is to use an inventory file to organize your managed nodes into groups with information like the ansible_network_os and the SSH user.
trans-unit.target: 这本剧本很有用。但是，运行它仍然需要几个命令行标志。此外，与手动进行相同更改相比，在单个设备上运行剧本并不会带来巨大的效率提升。利用Ansible的全部功能的下一步是使用清单文件将受管节点组织到包含 ansible_network_os 和SSH用户等信息的组中。

trans-unit.source: This plugin logs ansible-playbook and ansible runs to a syslog server in JSON format
trans-unit.target: 这个插件以JSON格式将ansible-playbook和ansible的运行记录到syslog服务器。

trans-unit.source: This plugin only applies to inventory sources that are not paths and contain at least one comma.
trans-unit.target: 此插件只适用于非路径且至少包含一个逗号的库存源。

trans-unit.source: This plugin only applies to inventory strings that are not paths and contain a comma.
trans-unit.target: 此插件只适用于非路径且包含逗号的库存字符串。

trans-unit.source: This plugin provides low level abstraction APIs for sending and receiving commands using NX-API with devices running Cisco NX-OS.
trans-unit.target: 该插件提供了低级抽象API,用于使用NX-API与运行Cisco NX-OS的设备发送和接收命令。

trans-unit.source: This plugin provides low level abstraction api’s to send REST API requests to EXOS network devices and receive JSON responses.
trans-unit.target: 该插件提供了低级抽象api，以将REST API请求发送到EXOS网络设备并接收JSON响应。

trans-unit.source: This plugin will use the ‘say’ or ‘espeak’ program to “speak” about play events.
trans-unit.target: 此插件将使用“说”或“说”程序来“说”播放事件。

trans-unit.source: This policy action is performed on connection requests.
trans-unit.target: 该策略操作是在连接请求上执行的。

trans-unit.source: This policy decides whether the blocks of a volume will be tiered to the capacity tier.
trans-unit.target: 该策略决定了一个卷的块是否会被分层到容量层。

trans-unit.source: This policy is used to perform security actions such as distributed denial of service (ddos) attack mitigation, etc.
trans-unit.target: 该策略用于执行安全操作,如分布式拒绝服务(ddos)攻击缓解等。

trans-unit.source: This policy matches on a request.
trans-unit.target: 该政策在请求时匹配。

trans-unit.source: This policy should have 'RegistryWrite, ServiceConnect, DeviceConnect' accesses. You may get 401 error when you lack any of these.
trans-unit.target: 这个策略应该有'RegistryWrite,ServiceConnect,DeviceConnect'的访问。当你缺少其中任何一个时,你可能会得到401错误。

trans-unit.source: This policy should have at least 'Registry Read' access.
trans-unit.target: 此策略至少应具有 "注册表读取 "的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: This policy will match on a request.
trans-unit.target: 该政策将根据要求进行匹配。

trans-unit.source: This prefix can be overridden by the se-group template.
trans-unit.target: 这个前缀可以被se-group模板覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This prevents the entire distribution origin from being exposed at the root.
trans-unit.target: 这就从根本上防止了整个分布源头的暴露。

trans-unit.source: This produces a JSON dump of events in a directory, a file for each host, the directory used MUST be passed as a command line option.
trans-unit.target: 这将在一个目录下产生一个JSON事件转储,每个主机的文件,使用的目录必须作为命令行选项传递。

trans-unit.source: This profile defines the TCP or UDP options used to send IP-traffic logs to the pool of collectors.
trans-unit.target: 此配置文件定义了用于向收集器池发送 IP 流量日志的 TCP 或 UDP 选项。

trans-unit.source: This program won’t install on Windows with Ansible
trans-unit.target: 此程序将不会在带有Ansible的Windows上安装

trans-unit.source: This prompt will then be used to decrypt (in memory only) any vault encrypted files that are accessed.
trans-unit.target: 然后,该提示将用于解密(仅在内存中)任何被访问的金库加密文件。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to specify the type of the OS that is included in the disk when creating a VM from a managed image.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可让您指定从托管映像创建虚拟机时磁盘中包含的操作系统类型。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used for decommissioning purposes.
trans-unit.target: 该财产可用于退役用途。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot been changed.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性是不能改变的。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates whether the guest has gone into one of the s1, s2 or s3 standby modes. False indicates the guest is awake.
trans-unit.target: 此属性表示客人是否已进入s1、s2或s3待机模式之一。假表示客人是醒着的。

trans-unit.source: This property is filled by the STORAGE_DEVICE_NUMBER structure returned from the IOCTL_STORAGE_GET_DEVICE_NUMBER control code
trans-unit.target: 该属性由IOCTL_STORAGE_GET_DEVICE_NUMBER控制代码返回的STORAGE_DEVICE_NUMBER结构填充。

trans-unit.source: This property is not updatable.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不可更新。

trans-unit.source: This property is updatable.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性是可以更新的。

trans-unit.source: This property is updatable. Format should be according to ISO-8601, for instance "2019-06-26".
trans-unit.target: 该属性是可以更新的。格式应符合ISO-8601标准,例如 "2019-06-26"。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to check whether the NPIV can be enabled on the Virtual machine with non-rdm disks in the configuration, so this is potentially not enabling npiv on vmfs disks. Also this property is used to check whether RDM is required to generate WWNs for a virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于检查配置中非rdm磁盘的虚拟机上是否可以启用npiv,所以这有可能是没有在vmfs磁盘上启用npiv。同时该属性也用于检查是否需要RDM为虚拟机生成WWN。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to enable or disable the NPIV capability on a desired virtual machine on a temporary basis.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于临时启用或禁用所需虚拟机的 NPIV 功能。

trans-unit.source: This property would take effect for a region when regionalReplicaCount is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 当未指定 regionReplicaCount 时,此属性将对区域生效。

trans-unit.source: This provides the Ansible community the opportunity to test Ansible and report bugs or issues they might come across.
trans-unit.target: 这为Ansible社区提供了测试Ansible和报告他们可能遇到的错误或问题的机会。

trans-unit.source: This provides the ability for a pool member that is newly enabled or marked up to receive proportionally less traffic than other members in the pool.
trans-unit.target: 这为新启用或标记的池成员提供了按比例接收比池中其他成员更少流量的能力。

trans-unit.source: This provides the ability to cause a pool member that has just been enabled, or marked up, to receive proportionally less traffic than other members in the pool.
trans-unit.target: 这提供了使刚刚启用或标记的池成员收到的流量比池中其他成员少的能力。

trans-unit.source: This pulls in variables from the group_vars/os_CentOS.yml file.
trans-unit.target: 这将从 group_vars/os_CentOS.yml 文件中引入变量。

trans-unit.source: This range is a CIDR specification, for example: `192.168.0.0/16`.
trans-unit.target: 这个范围是CIDR规范,例如:`192.168.0.0/16`。

trans-unit.source: This record defines the information about the domain and where the domain / subdomains direct to.
trans-unit.target: 这条记录定义了域名的信息,以及域名/子域名的指向。

trans-unit.source: This refers to the protocol used by the network device to interact with the remote server from where to download the backup configuration. The choices are FTP, SFTP, TFTP, or SCP. Any other protocols will result in error. If this parameter is not specified, there is no default value to be used.
trans-unit.target: 这指的是网络设备与远程服务器交互时使用的协议,从哪里下载备份配置。可选择的协议有FTP、SFTP、TFTP或SCP。任何其他协议都会导致错误。如果未指定此参数,则不使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: This refers to the protocol used by the network device to interact with the remote server from where to download the firmware image. The choices are FTP, SFTP, TFTP, or SCP. Any other protocols will result in error. If this parameter is not specified there is no default value to be used.
trans-unit.target: 这指的是网络设备与远程服务器交互时使用的协议,从哪里下载固件镜像。可选择的协议有FTP、SFTP、TFTP或SCP。任何其他协议将导致错误。如果没有指定此参数,则没有默认值可供使用。

trans-unit.source: This refers to the protocol used by the network device to interact with the remote server to where to upload the backup configuration. The choices are FTP, SFTP, TFTP, or SCP. Any other protocols will result in error. If this parameter is not specified, there is no default value to be used.
trans-unit.target: 这是指网络设备与远程服务器交互时使用的协议,可将备份配置上传到哪里。可选择的协议有 FTP、SFTP、TFTP 或 SCP。任何其他协议都会导致错误。如果未指定此参数,则不使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: This refers to the type of configuration which will be used for the rolling back process. The choices are the running or startup configurations. There is no default value, so it will result in an error if the input is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 这指的是将用于回滚过程的配置类型。可选择运行或启动配置。没有默认值,所以如果输入错误,会导致错误。

trans-unit.source: This relates to FeatureName in the Powershell cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 这与Powershell cmdlet中的 FeatureName 有关。

trans-unit.source: This removes the risk of sharing sensitive data with others when sharing your playbook source with them.
trans-unit.target: 这就消除了与他人共享您的游戏本源时,与他人共享敏感数据的风险。

trans-unit.source: This requires XenServer Tools to be preinstalled on the VM to work properly.
trans-unit.target: 这需要在虚拟机上预装 XenServer Tools 才能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: This requires that the above commands as well as /etc/passwd must exist on the target host, otherwise it will be a fatal error.
trans-unit.target: 这要求上述命令以及 /etc/passwd 必须存在于目标主机上，否则将是致命错误。

trans-unit.source: This requires that these commands exist on the targeted host, otherwise it will be a fatal error.
trans-unit.target: 这就要求这些命令在目标主机上存在,否则会出现致命的错误。

trans-unit.source: This requires the Active Directory to be set up with a certificate that supports StartTLS.
trans-unit.target: 这需要活动目录设置一个支持StartTLS的证书。

trans-unit.source: This requires the PyYaml library.
trans-unit.target: 这需要PyYaml库。

trans-unit.source: This requires the SMB 3 protocol which is only supported from Windows Server 2012 or Windows 8, older versions like Windows 7 or Windows Server 2008 (R2) must set this to no and use no encryption.
trans-unit.target: 这要求仅Windows Server 2012或Windows 8支持SMB 3协议，较早的版本（如Windows 7或Windows Server 2008（R2））必须将此协议设置为 no ,并且不使用加密。

trans-unit.source: This requires the node_ids to be specified as MIPs (Management IP Adresses)
trans-unit.target: 这就要求将node_ids指定为MIPs(管理IP地址)。

trans-unit.source: This requires vmware-tools (vmtoolsd) to properly work after creation.
trans-unit.target: 这需要vmware-tools(vmtoolsd)创建后才能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: This reset type indicates that it is safe to retry.
trans-unit.target: 该复位类型表示可以安全重试。

trans-unit.source: This resource module configures and manages attributes of OSPFv2 routes on VyOS network devices.
trans-unit.target: 该资源模块可以配置和管理VyOS网络设备上OSPFv2路由的属性。

trans-unit.source: This resource module configures and manages attributes of OSPFv3 routes on VyOS network devices.
trans-unit.target: 该资源模块可以配置和管理VyOS网络设备上OSPFv3路由的属性。

trans-unit.source: This result can be converted to canonical form with ipaddr() to produce a subnet in CIDR format:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 ipaddr() 将结果转换为规范形式，以产生CIDR格式的子网：

trans-unit.source: This results in {"foo": "a", "var": "b", "bar": "c"}.
trans-unit.target: 结果为 {"foo": "a", "var": "b", "bar": "c"} 。

trans-unit.source: This retrieves all the VMs which satisfy these two conditions and populates them in the inventory. Notice that the conditions are combined using an and operation.
trans-unit.target: 这将检索满足这两个条件的所有VM，并将它们填充在清单中。请注意，条件是使用 and 操作进行组合的。

trans-unit.source: This returns everything found in Galaxy for the role:
trans-unit.target: 这将返回在银河中找到的一切角色。

trans-unit.source: This role cannot be an owner role.
trans-unit.target: 这个角色不能是所有者角色。

trans-unit.source: This role will define all the permissions that the security group/service principal/user must have on the projected subscription.
trans-unit.target: 该角色将定义安全组/服务委托人/用户在预计订阅上必须拥有的所有权限。

trans-unit.source: This role will define all the permissions that the security group/service principal/user must have on the subscription.

trans-unit.source: This sets the interval (in seconds) of Ansible internal processes polling each other. Lower values improve performance with large playbooks at the expense of extra CPU load. Higher values are more suitable for Ansible usage in automation scenarios, when UI responsiveness is not required but CPU usage might be a concern. The default corresponds to the value hardcoded in Ansible <= 2.1
trans-unit.target: 这设置了Ansible内部进程互相轮询的间隔（以秒为单位）。较低的值可提高大型剧本的性能，但会增加CPU负载。当不需要UI响应性但可能需要考虑CPU使用率时，较高的值更适合自动化场景中的Ansible使用。默认值对应于Ansible <= 2.1中的硬编码值

trans-unit.source: This sets the shell the ansible controller will use on the target machine, overrides executable in ansible.cfg which defaults to /bin/sh. trans-unit.source: This sets which playbook dirs will be used as a root to process vars plugins, which includes finding host_vars/group_vars The top option follows the traditional behaviour of using the top playbook in the chain to find the root directory. The bottom option follows the 2.4.0 behaviour of using the current playbook to find the root directory. The all option examines from the first parent to the current playbook.
trans-unit.target: 该剧本显示目录此集将被用作根处理瓦尔插件，其包括寻找host_vars / group_vars的 top 选项如下使用顶部剧本在链中找到的根目录的传统行为。该 bottom 选项如下使用当前的剧本找到根目录下的2.4.0行为。在 all 从第一父到目前剧本选项检查。

trans-unit.source: This sets which playbook dirs will be used as a root to process vars plugins, which includes finding host_vars/group_varsThe top option follows the traditional behaviour of using the top playbook in the chain to find the root directory.The bottom option follows the 2.4.0 behaviour of using the current playbook to find the root directory.The all option examines from the first parent to the current playbook.
trans-unit.target: 设置哪个剧本目录将用作处理vars插件的根目录，包括查找host_vars / group_vars top 选项遵循传统的行为，即使用链中顶部的剧本来查找根目录。 bottom 选项遵循2.4.0。使用当前的剧本找了根的行为directory.The all 从第一父选项将检查当前的剧本。

trans-unit.source: This setting affects packages installed from a repository as well as "local" packages installed from the filesystem or a URL.

trans-unit.source: This setting can be used to optimize vars_plugin usage depending on user’s inventory size and play selection. Setting to C(demand) will run vars_plugins relative to inventory sources anytime vars are ‘demanded’ by tasks. Setting to C(start) will run vars_plugins relative to inventory sources after importing that inventory source.
trans-unit.target: 此设置可用于优化vars_plugin的使用，具体取决于用户的广告资源大小和播放选择。设置为C（demand）可以在任务“需要” vars时相对于清单源运行vars_plugins。设置为C（开始）将在导入清单资源后相对于清单资源运行vars_plugins。

trans-unit.source: This setting can be used to optimize vars_plugin usage depending on user’s inventory size and play selection.Setting to C(demand) will run vars_plugins relative to inventory sources anytime vars are ‘demanded’ by tasks.Setting to C(start) will run vars_plugins relative to inventory sources after importing that inventory source.
trans-unit.target: 此设置可用于根据用户的清单大小和播放选择来优化vars_plugin的使用。设置为C（demand）将在任务``需求''vars时相对于清单源运行vars_plugins。设置为C（start）将相对于vars_plugins运行导入该库存源后，将其添加到库存源。

trans-unit.source: This setting can't be changed after you create the endpoint.

trans-unit.source: This setting changes the behaviour of mismatched host patterns, it allows you to force a fatal error, a warning or just ignore it
trans-unit.target: 这个设置改变了不匹配主机模式的行为,它允许你强制执行一个致命的错误,一个警告或只是忽略它。

trans-unit.source: This setting controls how variables merge in Ansible. By default Ansible will override variables in specific precedence orders, as described in Variables. When a variable of higher precedence wins, it will replace the other value. Some users prefer that variables that are hashes (aka ‘dictionaries’ in Python terms) are merged. This setting is called ‘merge’. This is not the default behavior and it does not affect variables whose values are scalars (integers, strings) or arrays. We generally recommend not using this setting unless you think you have an absolute need for it, and playbooks in the official examples repos do not use this setting In version 2.0 a combine filter was added to allow doing this for a particular variable (described in Filters).
trans-unit.target: 此设置控制变量在Ansible中的合并方式。默认情况下，Ansible将按特定优先级顺序覆盖变量，如“变量”中所述。当优先级较高的变量获胜时，它将替换其他值。一些用户更喜欢将散列变量（Python术语又称为“字典”）进行合并。此设置称为“合并”。这不是默认行为，它不会影响其值为标量（整数，字符串）或数组的变量。我们通常建议不要使用此设置，除非您认为您绝对需要此设置，并且官方示例存储库中的剧本不使用此设置。在2.0版中，添加了 combine 过滤器以允许对特定变量执行此操作（如“过滤器”中所述） ）。

trans-unit.source: This setting controls how variables merge in Ansible. By default Ansible will override variables in specific precedence orders, as described in Variables. When a variable of higher precedence wins, it will replace the other value.Some users prefer that variables that are hashes (aka ‘dictionaries’ in Python terms) are merged. This setting is called ‘merge’. This is not the default behavior and it does not affect variables whose values are scalars (integers, strings) or arrays. We generally recommend not using this setting unless you think you have an absolute need for it, and playbooks in the official examples repos do not use this settingIn version 2.0 a combine filter was added to allow doing this for a particular variable (described in Filters).
trans-unit.target: 此设置控制变量在Ansible中的合并方式。默认情况下，Ansible将按特定优先级顺序覆盖变量，如“变量”中所述。当优先级较高的变量获胜时，它将替换其他值。某些用户更喜欢将散列变量（Python术语为“字典”）进行合并。此设置称为“合并”。这不是默认行为，它不会影响其值为标量（整数，字符串）或数组的变量。我们通常建议不要使用此设置，除非您认为您绝对需要此设置，并且官方示例存储库中的剧本不使用此设置。在2.0版中，添加了 combine 过滤器以允许对特定变量执行此操作（在“过滤器”中进行了介绍） 。

trans-unit.source: This setting controls if become is skipped when remote user and become user are the same. I.E root sudo to root.
trans-unit.target: 这个设置控制当远程用户和成为用户相同时,是否跳过成为。如:root sudo改为root。

trans-unit.source: This setting controls the default policy of fact gathering (facts discovered about remote systems). When ‘implicit’ (the default), the cache plugin will be ignored and facts will be gathered per play unless ‘gather_facts: False’ is set. When ‘explicit’ the inverse is true, facts will not be gathered unless directly requested in the play. The ‘smart’ value means each new host that has no facts discovered will be scanned, but if the same host is addressed in multiple plays it will not be contacted again in the playbook run. This option can be useful for those wishing to save fact gathering time. Both ‘smart’ and ‘explicit’ will use the cache plugin.
trans-unit.target: 此设置控制事实收集（发现的有关远程系统的事实）的默认策略。如果设置为'implicit'（默认），则除非设置了'gather_facts：False'，否则缓存插件将被忽略，并且每次播放都将收集事实。当“显式”反之成立时，除非在剧本中直接要求，否则事实不会被收集。 “ smart”值表示将扫描没有发现事实的每台新主机，但是如果在多个播放中对同一个主机进行寻址，则在运行剧本时不会再次联系该主机。对于希望节省事实收集时间的人员来说，此选项很有用。 “智能”和“显式”都将使用缓存插件。

trans-unit.source: This setting controls the default policy of fact gathering (facts discovered about remote systems).When ‘implicit’ (the default), the cache plugin will be ignored and facts will be gathered per play unless ‘gather_facts: False’ is set.When ‘explicit’ the inverse is true, facts will not be gathered unless directly requested in the play.The ‘smart’ value means each new host that has no facts discovered will be scanned, but if the same host is addressed in multiple plays it will not be contacted again in the playbook run.This option can be useful for those wishing to save fact gathering time. Both ‘smart’ and ‘explicit’ will use the cache plugin.
trans-unit.target: 该设置控制默认的事实收集策略（关于远程系统的事实）。当'隐式'（默认）时，缓存插件将被忽略，除非设置了'gather_facts：False'，否则每次播放都会收集事实。 “显式”表示相反，否则将不收集事实，除非在剧本中直接提出要求。“ smart”值表示将扫描每个未发现事实的新主机，但是如果同一主机在多个剧本中得到寻址，则不会扫描。在Playbook运行中再次与之联系。此选项对于希望节省事实收集时间的人很有用。“智能”和“显式”都将使用缓存插件。

trans-unit.source: This setting decides whether se is to be deployed from the cloud marketplace or to be created by the controller.

trans-unit.source: This should give you a good idea of how to structure a multi-tier application with Ansible, and orchestrate operations upon that app, with the eventual goal of continuous delivery to your customers. You could extend the idea of the rolling upgrade to lots of different parts of the app; maybe add front-end web servers along with application servers, for instance, or replace the SQL database with something like MongoDB or Riak. Ansible gives you the capability to easily manage complicated environments and automate common operations.
trans-unit.target: 这应该会让你对如何使用Ansible来构建一个多层应用有一个很好的想法,并对该应用进行协调操作,最终的目标是持续交付给你的客户。你可以将滚动升级的想法扩展到应用程序的许多不同部分;例如,可以在添加前端Web服务器和应用程序服务器的同时添加前端Web服务器,或者用MongoDB或Riak等替换SQL数据库。Ansible为你提供了轻松管理复杂环境和自动化普通操作的能力。

trans-unit.source: This signifies the networking tier used for configuring this access configuration. If an AccessConfig is specified without a valid external IP address, an ephemeral IP will be created with this networkTier. If an AccessConfig with a valid external IP address is specified, it must match that of the networkTier associated with the Address resource owning that IP.
trans-unit.target: 这表示用于配置此访问配置的网络层。如果指定的 AccessConfig 没有有效的外部 IP 地址,则将使用该网络层创建一个短暂 IP。如果指定了具有有效外部 IP 地址的 AccessConfig,它必须与拥有该 IP 的地址资源相关联的网络层(networkTier)相匹配。

trans-unit.source: This signifies what the ForwardingRule will be used for and can be EXTERNAL, INTERNAL, or INTERNAL_MANAGED. EXTERNAL is used for Classic Cloud VPN gateways, protocol forwarding to VMs from an external IP address, and HTTP(S), SSL Proxy, TCP Proxy, and Network TCP/UDP load balancers.
trans-unit.target: 这表示 ForwardingRule 将用于什么,可以是 EXTERNAL、INTERNAL 或 INTERNAL_MANAGED。EXTERNAL 用于 Classic Cloud VPN 网关、从外部 IP 地址转发到虚拟机的协议,以及 HTTP(S)、SSL Proxy、TCP Proxy 和网络 TCP/UDP 负载平衡器。

trans-unit.source: This signifies what the ForwardingRule will be used for and can only take the following values: INTERNAL, EXTERNAL The value of INTERNAL means that this will be used for Internal Network Load Balancing (TCP, UDP). The value of EXTERNAL means that this will be used for External Load Balancing (HTTP(S) LB, External TCP/UDP LB, SSL Proxy) .
trans-unit.target: 这标志着ForwardingRule将用于什么,只能取以下值。INTERNAL、EXTERNAL INTERNAL的值表示将用于内部网络负载均衡(TCP、UDP)。EXTERNAL的值意味着它将用于外部负载均衡(HTTP(S)LB、外部TCP/UDP LB、SSL Proxy)。

trans-unit.source: This signifies what the GlobalForwardingRule will be used for.
trans-unit.target: 这表示GlobalForwardingRule将用于什么。

trans-unit.source: This specifies the path to the CNOS command file which needs to be applied. This usually comes from the commands folder. Generally this file is the output of the variables applied on a template file. So this command is preceded by a template module. Note The command file must contain the Ansible keyword {{ inventory_hostname }} in its filename to ensure that the command file is unique for each switch and condition. If this is omitted, the command file will be overwritten during iteration. For example, commandfile=./commands/clos_leaf_bgp_{{ inventory_hostname }}_commands.txt
trans-unit.target: 这指定了需要应用的CNOS命令文件的路径。这通常来自于命令文件夹。一般这个文件是应用在模板文件上的变量的输出。所以这个命令前面有一个模板模块。注意 命令文件的文件名中必须包含Ansible关键字{{inventory_hostname }},以确保每个开关和条件的命令文件是唯一的。如果省略了这一点,命令文件将在迭代过程中被覆盖。例如,commandfile=./commands/clos_leaf_bgp_{{inventory_hostname }}_commands.txt。

trans-unit.source: This specifies the path to the CNOS command file which needs to be applied. This usually comes from the commands folder. Generally this file is the output of the variables applied on a template file. So this command is preceded by a template module. The command file must contain the Ansible keyword {{ inventory_hostname }} and the condition flag in its filename to ensure that the command file is unique for each switch and condition. If this is omitted, the command file will be overwritten during iteration. For example, commandfile=./commands/clos_leaf_bgp_ {{ inventory_hostname }}_LP21_commands.txt
trans-unit.target: 这指定了需要应用的CNOS命令文件的路径。这通常来自于命令文件夹。一般这个文件是应用在模板文件上的变量的输出。所以这个命令前面有一个模板模块。命令文件的文件名中必须包含Ansible关键字{{inventory_hostname }}和条件标志,以确保每个开关和条件的命令文件是唯一的。如果省略了这一点,命令文件将在迭代过程中被覆盖。例如,commandfile=./commands/clos_leaf_bgp_{{inventory_hostname }}_LP21_commands.txt。

trans-unit.source: This task assumes you previously gathered facts to determine the ansible_distribution needed to locate the template. Alternately, you could provide the path in the parser/template_path option.

trans-unit.source: This task gathers facts for the machines in the dbservers group and assigns the facts to those machines, even though the play targets the app_servers group. This way you can lookup hostvars[‘dbhost1’][‘ansible_default_ipv4’][‘address’] even though dbservers were not part of the play, or left out by using –limit.
trans-unit.target: 该任务为dbservers组中的计算机收集事实，并将事实分配给这些计算机，即使该播放以app_servers组为目标。这样，即使dbserver不在游戏中，也可以通过使用 –limit 来查找 hostvars[‘dbhost1’][‘ansible_default_ipv4’][‘address’] 。
